abstract: Iran's state-run Islamic Republic News Agency reports that detained Washington Post correspondent Jason Rezian will go to trial soon, but no information is released about the charges he faces.
lead_paragraph: Jason Rezaian, the Washington Post’s Tehran correspondent, who has been incarcerated since July 22, “will be tried soon,” Iran’s state-run Islamic Republic News Agency said Wednesday.
snippet: Jason Rezaian, the Washington Post’s Tehran correspondent, who has been incarcerated since July 22, “will be tried soon,” Iran’s state-run Islamic Republic News Agency said Wednesday.

headline.main: Iran: Washington Post Reporter’s Trial to Be ‘Soon,’ but Charges Are Unclear
headline.print_headline: Iran: Washington Post Reporter’s Trial to Be ‘Soon,’ but Charges Are Unclear
